wikipedia_page.main: Neil Anderson (born 27 February 1979) is an Irish cricketer. He is a right-handed batsman and a left-arm spin bowler. He played two matches for Ireland in 1998, against MCC and Bangladesh. He also played one List A match for Northern Ireland as part of the cricket tournament at the 1998 Commonwealth Games.
